structure.unit: G KENTUCKY OFFICE OF HOMELAND SECURITY

law.catch_line: Commercial Mobile Radio Service Emergency Telecommunications Board attached to office.
law.text: The Commercial Mobile Radio Service Emergency Telecommunications Board of Kentucky, created in KRS 65.7623, shall be attached to the Office of Homeland Security for administrative purposes.
law.history: Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 193, sec. 4, effective July 12, 2006.
